abstract: Is Dell about to make an ultra-sleek laptop? It has picked out a name.
snippet: Is Dell about to make an ultra-sleek laptop? It has picked out a name.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 5:35 p.m.: Uptownlife.net removed its reference to Dell’s Adamo product and marketing material, following the publication of this blog post.

headline.main: Dell’s Mystery ‘Adamo’ Could Be Thinner Than Air
